title: The discoueries of the world from their first originall vnto the yeere of our Lord 1555. Briefly written in the Portugall tongue by Antonie Galuano, gouernour of Ternate, the chiefe island of the Malucos: corrected, quoted, and now published in English by Richard Hakluyt, sometimes student of Christ church in Oxford
author: Galvão, António, d. 1557.
publisher: [Printed at Eliot's Court Press] impensis G. Bishop,
